summary: Implements a Megatron‑based latent diffusion model, managing model construction, parallel gradient handling, adapter integration, checkpoint loading, and the full training‑validation‑testing lifecycle including data preparation, forward/backward computation, and inference utilities.
business_intent: Enable scalable, high‑throughput generative AI using latent diffusion on large GPU clusters, supporting rapid development, fine‑tuning with adapters, and reliable deployment through checkpoint management and efficient training pipelines.
